00031 using namespace Hypertable;
00032 
00036 void RequestHandlerDropTable::run() {
00037   ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00038   bool if_exists;
00039   const char *table_name;
00040   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->messageLen - 2;
00041   uint8_t *msgPtr = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00042 
00043   // if_exists flag
00044   if (!Serialization::decode_bool(&msgPtr, &remaining, &if_exists))
00045     goto abort;
00046 
00047   // table name
00048   if (!Serialization::decode_string(&msgPtr, &remaining, &table_name))
00049     goto abort;
00050 
00051   m_master->drop_table(&cb, table_name, if_exists);
00052 
00053   return;
00054 
00055  abort:
00056   HT_ERROR("Encoding problem with Drop Table message");
00057   cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Encoding problem with Drop Table message");
00058   return;
00059 }
